description.value:
Your knowledge of the natural world makes you more appealing to all sorts of denizens of the untamed places.

Prerequisites: Wis 13

Benefit: You can use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} to improve the attitude of a magical beast, a fey, or an animal with an Intelligence score of 3 or higher. This functions just like a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#change-attitude]{change a person’s initial attitude}, but it isn’t language dependent.
